item.title: SBIDIOT IoT Malware: miner edition
item.description: The SBIDIOT IoT malware was observed earlier this year in april. Recently I spotted a sample with a cryptominer added on, so let’s see what’s changed. Initial shell script The analysis starts at a shell script, which does the following: Download a binary for the specific architecture from 20.106.163.35, [arch].keen.onion.1337 Names it SSH and runs Downloads a generic shell script from 20.106.163.35 and names it systemd Runs it with 37.
